channel.title: Random on GGVY
channel.description: Recent content in Random on GGVY

item.title: Research != Software dev?
item.description: Some times I feel like I’m in the wrong place. At least a few times, while talking to scientists, I’ve realized that people don’t think of scientific software the same way I do, this is, as actual research. While I know I’m not a fancy computer/informatics scientist, I do believe that scientific software development is underestimated. When I was in the visiting day at Caltech, I recall that one of the questions that our host did to us during the visiting day was “what makes you excited about coming to Caltech?
